# SiFive - Thirdparty subdirectory #

This directory will contain third party sources and/or libraries that it uses by the program into the software directory.

**FreeRTOS**: it is a class of RTOS that is designed to be small enough to run on a microcontroller â€“ although its use is not limited to microcontroller applications. (please visit https://www.freertos.org for more details). Please read the license before to use it (available into the FreeRTOS subdirectory)
